https://tmrev.io/movie/430027-Blue Signal 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null As you travel, the satellite that monitors your pulse mistakes a telephone book for an ocean. It's late, they'll be gone by the time you arrive, but the voice on the radio keeps your mind occupied with a story about cities and sand. Blue Signal
